column3: Where is your Hadoop environment hosted?
Which distribution of Hadooop are you currently using? (Cloudera, Apache, others)
Please mention the cloud where you have presence? (Azure, GCP, AWS, IBM Cloud, Oracle Cloud, others)
Where are you on your cloud migration journey?
What challenges are you facing with current Hadoop environment?
Name few technologies in your current landscape?(ETL Tools, Scripting/Programming language, Data Warehouse, BI Tool, etc)
What kinds of workloads do you have ?
Do you have a use-case for real-time data processing?
Is there a scope of AI/ML in your use-case?
Please share details of the areas which you would like to be covered as part of the session.
